title: static fuzzy white/grey screen and multiple bugs, the screen frezzes and nothing helps.
content:
in the past few days there are multiple bugs.
the screen freezes, on a static fuzzy white/grey color. nothing helps. 
the screen freezes all the time in the middle of texting or any other simple activities.
my pixel 2 is lass than a year old. 
I have tried all the options on this web. including factory reset but nothing works.
I dont have a google store in my country but i have google warranty. 
I saw few posts here with the same problem but with no solution.
